articles.author: Dan Goodin
articles.title: Meta and Yandex are de-anonymizing Android users’ web browsing identifiers - Ars Technica
articles.description: Abuse allows Meta and Yandex to attach persistent identifiers to detailed browsing histories.

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Exercise improves colon cancer survival, high-quality trial finds - Ars Technica
articles.description: Any type of aerobic exercise works for the improvements, study finds.
